name: King Fisher
description:
Story

Don't give up on catching that big fish!

You headed out to the pond rumoured to house the most prestigious fish, but when you arrive all you seem to catch is trash! In an effort to help the fish, you clear the lake so their home can thrive once more!

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move your character around and adjust the camera with your mouse. Once you're in a good fishing spot, hold F to cast your fishing rod! Then wait until something bites...and when it does, quickly hold R to reel it in! Hit C to cancel!

Tip

You don't have to fish on the pier.

Watch out for when the line turns red! Stop reeling for a moment and then get right back to it.

Keep an eye out for a golden shadow

Who are we?

Thrasher - Design, Programming, Animation - @thrasher08
